title: TSX hits an 11-day low as AI jitters weigh on technology shares
description: Canada's main stock index edged lower on Tuesday as doubts lingered that booming investment in artificial intelligence will pay off, with declines for the technology and industrial sectors offsetting gains for energy.
content:
Summary
Companies
TSX ends down 0.1% at 30,036.46
Posts lowest closing level since November 7
Tech sector falls 1.1% with Celestica down 3.5%
Energy rises 1.9% as oil settles 1.4% higher

title: Nvidia set for $320 billion price swing after earnings, options indicate
description: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Nvidia's earnings report on Wednesday could trigger a $320 billion swing in the chipmaker's market value — the largest post-earnings move ever for the AI giant — as investors seek signals about whether the artificial intelligence boom is accelerating or cooling.
content: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Nvidia's earnings report on Wednesday could trigger a $320 billion swing in the chipmaker's market value — the largest post-earnings move ever for the AI giant — as investors seek signals about whether the artificial intelligence ... [2704 chars]

description: Nvidia's earnings report on Wednesday could trigger a $320 billion swing in the chipmaker's market value — the largest post-earnings move ever for the AI giant — as investors seek signals about whether the artificial intelligence boom is accelerating or cooling.

title: How organisations can prepare employees for the AI revolution
description: At a time when humans perceive artificial intelligence as a threat to their jobs, how do organisations make sure that their employees are not antsy, but also try to keep up with technological advancements? At the recent SAP Connect event in Las Vegas, there were some answers.

title: Mind the glitch: is Hollywood finally getting to grips with movies about artificial intelligence?
description: As Gore Verbinski’s AI-apocalypse film Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die hurtles towards us, it’s clear from the over-caffeinated trailer that we won’t be getting another ponderous parable about robot souls, digital enlightenment or the hubris of man
content: It’s easy to forget, given the current glut of robot-uprising doom flicks, that Hollywood has been doing the artificial intelligence thing for decades – long before anything resembling true AI existed in the real world. And now we live in an era in w... [2684 chars]

title: GPU Cloud Computing: Powering the Future of High-Performance Workloads
description: GPU cloud computing is rapidly becoming the backbone of modern innovation. title: Coal minister inaugurates CIL pavilion at IITF 2025
description: The pavilion showcases opencast mining method, use of artificial intelligence in coal mining, functioning of Integrated Command and Control Centre (ICCC) at headquarters of CIL Subsidiaries
content:
Coal and mines minister G Kishan Reddy on Tuesday inaugurated the Coal India Ltd (CIL) pavilion, which is showcasing initiatives to acquire critical minerals in the domestic market and overseas, at the trade fair in the national capital.

title: World shares sink
description: Shares in Europe and Asia tumbled on Tuesday, with benchmarks in Tokyo and Seoul sinking more than three per cent, after Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence -related shares pulled U.S. stocks lower.
content:
